name: vue-ssh-cert
description: A web frontend for generating OpenSSH Certificates

scripts.build: babel -d dist src && cp -r ./node_modules/bootstrap/dist/{js,css} ./dist/assets/ && cp ./node_modules/vue/dist/vue.min.js ./dist/assets/js/ && cp ./node_modules/vue-resource/dist/vue-resource.min.js ./dist/assets/js/ && cp ./node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js ./dist/assets/js/

author: knight_42 <anonymousknight96@gmail.com>
